info.name: MarketZone - All Invoices API
info.description: Complete API collection for MarketZone Invoice management system. Includes all CRUD operations for Purchase, Sales, and Roasting invoices with posting functionality and detailed examples.

Retrieve a specific purchase invoice by its ID

request.description: Update an existing purchase invoice. Cannot update posted invoices. Requires authentication.
Post a purchase invoice. This finalizes the purchase and updates inventory. Requires authentication.
Delete a purchase invoice. Cannot delete posted invoices. Requires authentication.

request.description: Update an existing sales invoice. Cannot update posted invoices. Requires authentication.
Post a sales invoice. This finalizes the sale and updates inventory. Requires authentication.
Delete a sales invoice. Cannot delete posted invoices. Requires authentication.
Retrieve a paginated list of roasting invoices
Retrieve a specific roasting invoice by its ID
Create a new roasting invoice. Requires authentication.

request.description: Update an existing roasting invoice. Cannot update posted invoices. Requires authentication.
Post a roasting invoice with actual quantities after roasting. This finalizes the roasting process. Requires authentication.
Delete a roasting invoice. Cannot delete posted invoices. Requires authentication.
